reg_pit.acttitle: Employment and Assistance Act; Employment and Assistance for Persons with Disabilities Act
reg_pit.title: Forms Regulation

change.changenote: Regulation BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 87/2018, effective April 24, 2018.

reg:regulation.reg:acttitle: Employment and Assistance Act; Employment and Assistance for Persons with Disabilities Act
reg:regulation.reg:title: Forms Regulation

bcl:section.bcl:text: The attached monthly report form is prescribed for the purposes of the Employment and Assistance Act and the Employment and Assistance for Persons with Disabilities Act.

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions relevant to the enactment of this regulation: Employment and Assistance Act, S.B.C. 2002, c. 40, section 33; Employment and Assistance for Persons with Disabilities Act, S.B.C. 2002, c. 41, section 24]
